- [The Essential Role of Empirical Validation in Legislative Redistricting Simulation](https://doi.org/10.1080/2330443X.2020.1791773) *Statistics and Public Policy* (2020) Vol. 7, No. 1, pp. 52-68.
- [Sequential Monte Carlo for Sampling Balanced and Compact Redistricting Plans](https://arxiv.org/pdf/2008.06131.pdf)
- [The use of differential privacy for census data and its impact on redistricting: The case of the 2020 U.S. Census](https://doi.org/10.1126/sciadv.abk3283) *Science Advances* (2021) Vol. 7, No. 41.
- [Simulated redistricting plans for the analysis and evaluation of redistricting in the United States](https://www.nature.com/articles/s41597-022-01808-2) *Scientific Data* (2022) Vol. 9, No. 1.
- [Comment: The Essential Role of Policy Evaluation for the 2020 Census Disclosure Avoidance System](https://hdsr.mitpress.mit.edu/pub/6ffzuq19/release/1) *Harvard Data Science Review* (2023) Special Issue 2.
